title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3221/81 of 11 November 1981 amending for the third time Regulation (EEC) No 3314/80 as regards the selling price of skimmed-milk powder for feed for calves
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 3221/81
OF 11 NOVEMBER 1981
AMENDING FOR THE THIRD TIME REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 3314/80 AS REGARDS THE SELLING PRICE OF SKIMMED-MILK POWDER FOR FEED FOR CALVES
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
REGULATION ( EEC ) NO 3314/80 IS HEREBY AMENDED AS FOLLOWS :
1 . THE FOLLOWING SUBPARAGRAPH IS ADDED TO ARTICLE 2  ( 1 ) ( B ) :
" HOWEVER , IN THE CASE OF SKIMMED-MILK POWDER TAKEN INTO STOCK BEFORE 1 NOVEMBER 1979 , THE PRICE SHALL BE EQUAL TO THE BUYING-IN PRICE APPLIED BY THE INTERVENTION AGENCY , LESS 3 ECU PER 100 KILOGRAMS . "
2 . THE FOLLOWING SUBPARAGRAPH IS ADDED TO ARTICLE 5  ( 2 ) ( B ) :
" HOWEVER , WHERE THE SELLING PRICE REFERRED TO IN THE SECOND SUBPARAGRAPH OF ARTICLE 2 ( 1 ) ( B ) IS APPLIED , THE SECURITY SHALL BE 6 ECU PER 100 KILOGRAMS . "

THIS REGULATION SHALL ENTER INTO FORCE ON THE THIRD DAY FOLLOWING ITS PUBLICATION IN THE OFFICIAL JOURNAL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES .
THIS REGULATION SHALL BE BINDING IN ITS ENTIRETY AND DIRECTLY APPLICABLE IN ALL MEMBER STATES .
attachments:
DONE AT BRUSSELS , 11 NOVEMBER 1981 .
FOR THE COMMISSION
POUL DALSAGER
MEMBER OF THE COMMISSION

( 2 ) OJ NO L 345 , 21 . 12 . 1980 , P . 12 .
